verses.roman:
caitanyera līlā--gambhīra, koṭi-samudra haite
ki lāgi' ki kare, keha nā pāre bujhite

synonyms: caitanyera līlā—the pastimes of Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; gambhīra—very deep; koṭi-samudra haite—more than millions of seas; ki lāgi'-for what reason; ki kare—what He does; keha—anyone; nā—not; pāre bujhite—can understand.
translation: The pastimes of Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu are deeper than millions of seas and oceans. Therefore no one can understand what He does nor why He does it.
